name: code-management-markers
description: Code Management Extension for Azure DevOps
author: Luiz Lima

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the tags, separated by semicolon.

inputs.name: comments
inputs.label: Comments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the comments. e.g. My comments text - $(Date:DD/MM/YYYY - HH:mm)

inputs.name: baseUrl
inputs.label: Base Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the base url. e.g. https://dev.azure.com/{org}/{team-proj}

inputs.name: timezone
inputs.label: Time Zone
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the time zone. e.g. America/New_York or America/Sao_Paulo
